Parameters: The target location to align with the center of the screen.

Zoom level at target. See @B_com#google#android#gms#maps#model#CameraPosition#Builder#zoom_E@ for details on the range the value will be clamped to. The larger the value the more zoomed in the camera is.
fromLatLngZoom(com.google.android.gms.ma.Description: Constructs a CameraPosition pointed for a particular target and zoom level. The resultant bearing is North, and the viewing angle is perpendicular to the Earth's surface. i.e., directly facing the Earth's surface, with the top of the screen pointing North.

Parameters: The target location to align with the center of the screen.
Zoom level at target. See @B_com#google#android#gms#maps#model#CameraPosition#zoom_E@ for details of restrictions.
The camera angle, in degrees, from the nadir (directly down). See @B_com#google#android#gms#maps#model#CameraPosition#tilt_E@ for details of restrictions.
Direction that the camera is pointing in, in degrees clockwise from north. This value will be normalized to be within 0 degrees inclusive and 360 degrees exclusive.
Throws: if tilt is outside the range of 0 to 90 degrees inclusive.
